entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @SecretarySonny @SecGeneScalia Mike history will record you as being one of Trump's lemmings instead of a VP who works for Americans. You have also failed as a Christian for standing by and keeping quiet while tens of thousands of Americans die from the Coronavirus. How do you tell that to your grandchildren?
